desc: Living in a one-party state, you realize that your ideas, values and life-style can add perspective and drama to the political landscape. Some use the term RINO with loathing, we speak it with pride. You bet I'm a RINO and it's a better state for it. Join em and beat em is our motto. Join us!

layout.text: We believe our ideas and life-style add value to the political landscape. You bet I'm a RINO and it's now a better Idaho for it.
